nodes.text: Hexum'Baz was a male Dug who served under Sebolto's employ during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. He was wanted dead by an anonymous person for unknown reasons. In 32 BBY, the person being quoted said that he just wanted the "worthless" Dug dead. His bounty was claimed by Jango Fett.
For some reason the Star Wars: Bounty Hunter: Prima's Official Strategy Guide labels his bounty as worth 3,000 alive (when he's worth the same price dead) and 1,500 dead.
